name: Dynaforce
description:
You'll be at the heart of all the action, collaborating with your team to develop tactics and take down enemies. Conquer rival teams on different maps, shaping the game's flow with your weapon choices and movement style. Showcase your skills by competing against other players in the competitive arena or join team-based modes to strategize with your squad. The wide array of weapons in the game allows you to customize and shape your gameplay according to your style. If you're the best player, it's time to make your name known in this competitive world!


Game Modes:

Capture The Flag


-Capture and defend the opponent's flag

Conguest


-Classic conquering mechanics, the one with the most territories wins the game

DeathMatch


-Everyone is one death match, the one who kills the most people wins.

Destroy


-plant and protect the bomb

Kill Confirmed


-kill the transporter and protect the necklace

Rush


-Attack to explode the target.

Team Deathmatch


-Team Death Match The team with the most kills wins the game.
